meanings.sent1: She was tingeing the painting with a hint of blue.
meanings.sent2: The sunset was tingeing the sky with shades of pink and orange.
meanings.sent3: The chef was tingeing the soup with just a touch of spice to surprise the guests.
meanings.sent4: His words were tingeing her heart with a sense of longing.
meanings.sent5: The gentle breeze tingeing the air with the scent of blooming flowers was enchanting.

meanings.definition: To affect with a slight taste or smell
meanings.sent1: The herbs were tingeing the stew with a delightful aroma.
meanings.sent2: The fresh lemon was tingeing the water with a tangy flavor.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy was tingeing the room with the smell of wet fur after playing in the rain.
meanings.sent4: The morning dew was tingeing the grass with a refreshing taste of nature.
meanings.sent5: The campfire smoke tingeing the air with a smoky scent made everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: To affect with a slight touch or stain
meanings.sent1: The spilled coffee was tingeing the tablecloth with a brown mark.
meanings.sent2: The ink was tingeing the paper with blots and smudges.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child was tingeing his hands with paint during art class.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds were tingeing the sky with dark shadows before the rain.
meanings.sent5: The setting sun tingeing the horizon with a golden hue was a breathtaking sight.
